00049 static bool isQuadPlanar(carve::geom3d::Vector &v1, carve::geom3d::Vector &v2,
00050                          carve::geom3d::Vector &v3, carve::geom3d::Vector &v4)
00051 {
00052     carve::geom3d::Vector vec1, vec2, vec3, cross;
00053 
00054     vec1 = v2 - v1;
00055     vec2 = v4 - v1;
00056     vec3 = v3 - v1;
00057 
00058     cross = carve::geom::cross(vec1, vec2);
00059 
00060     float production = carve::geom::dot(cross, vec3);
00061     float magnitude = 1e-6 * cross.length();
00062 
00063     return fabs(production) < magnitude;
00064 }
00065 
00066 static bool isFacePlanar(CSG_IFace &face, std::vector<carve::geom3d::Vector> &vertices)
00067 {
00068     if (face.vertex_number == 4) {
00069         return isQuadPlanar(vertices[face.vertex_index[0]], vertices[face.vertex_index[1]],
00070                             vertices[face.vertex_index[2]], vertices[face.vertex_index[3]]);
00071     }
00072 
00073     return true;
00074 }

00076 static void Carve_copyMeshes(std::vector<MeshSet<3>::mesh_t*> &meshes, std::vector<MeshSet<3>::mesh_t*> &new_meshes)
00077 {
00078     std::vector<MeshSet<3>::mesh_t*>::iterator it = meshes.begin();
00079 
00080     for(; it!=meshes.end(); it++) {
00081         MeshSet<3>::mesh_t *mesh = *it;
00082         MeshSet<3>::mesh_t *new_mesh = new MeshSet<3>::mesh_t(mesh->faces);
00083 
00084         new_meshes.push_back(new_mesh);
00085     }
00086 }

00088 static MeshSet<3> *Carve_meshSetFromMeshes(std::vector<MeshSet<3>::mesh_t*> &meshes)
00089 {
00090     std::vector<MeshSet<3>::mesh_t*> new_meshes;
00091 
00092     Carve_copyMeshes(meshes, new_meshes);
00093 
00094     return new MeshSet<3>(new_meshes);
00095 }

00097 static MeshSet<3> *Carve_meshSetFromTwoMeshes(std::vector<MeshSet<3>::mesh_t*> &left_meshes,
00098                                               std::vector<MeshSet<3>::mesh_t*> &right_meshes)
00099 {
00100     std::vector<MeshSet<3>::mesh_t*> new_meshes;
00101 
00102     Carve_copyMeshes(left_meshes, new_meshes);
00103     Carve_copyMeshes(right_meshes, new_meshes);
00104 
00105     return new MeshSet<3>(new_meshes);
00106 }

00108 static bool Carve_checkEdgeFaceIntersections_do(carve::csg::Intersections &intersections,
00109                                                 MeshSet<3>::face_t *face_a, MeshSet<3>::edge_t *edge_b)
00110 {
00111     if(intersections.intersects(edge_b, face_a))
00112         return true;
00113 
00114     carve::mesh::MeshSet<3>::vertex_t::vector_t _p;
00115     if(face_a->simpleLineSegmentIntersection(carve::geom3d::LineSegment(edge_b->v1()->v, edge_b->v2()->v), _p))
00116         return true;
00117 
00118     return false;
00119 }
00120 
00121 static bool Carve_checkEdgeFaceIntersections(carve::csg::Intersections &intersections,
00122                                              MeshSet<3>::face_t *face_a, MeshSet<3>::face_t *face_b)
00123 {
00124     MeshSet<3>::edge_t *edge_b;
00125 
00126     edge_b = face_b->edge;
00127     do {
00128         if(Carve_checkEdgeFaceIntersections_do(intersections, face_a, edge_b))
00129             return true;
00130         edge_b = edge_b->next;
00131     } while (edge_b != face_b->edge);
00132 
00133     return false;
00134 }

00136 static inline bool Carve_facesAreCoplanar(const MeshSet<3>::face_t *a, const MeshSet<3>::face_t *b)
00137 {
00138   carve::geom3d::Ray temp;
00139   // XXX: Find a better definition. This may be a source of problems
00140   // if floating point inaccuracies cause an incorrect answer.
00141   return !carve::geom3d::planeIntersection(a->plane, b->plane, temp);
00142 }

00144 static bool Carve_checkMeshSetInterseciton_do(carve::csg::Intersections &intersections,
00145                                               const RTreeNode<3, Face<3> *> *a_node,
00146                                               const RTreeNode<3, Face<3> *> *b_node,
00147                                               bool descend_a = true)
00148 {
00149     if(!a_node->bbox.intersects(b_node->bbox))
00150         return false;
00151 
00152     if(a_node->child && (descend_a || !b_node->child)) {
00153         for(RTreeNode<3, Face<3> *> *node = a_node->child; node; node = node->sibling) {
00154             if(Carve_checkMeshSetInterseciton_do(intersections, node, b_node, false))
00155                 return true;
00156         }
00157     }
00158     else if(b_node->child) {
00159         for(RTreeNode<3, Face<3> *> *node = b_node->child; node; node = node->sibling) {
00160             if(Carve_checkMeshSetInterseciton_do(intersections, a_node, node, true))
00161                 return true;
00162         }
00163     }
00164     else {
00165         for(size_t i = 0; i < a_node->data.size(); ++i) {
00166             MeshSet<3>::face_t *fa = a_node->data[i];
00167             aabb<3> aabb_a = fa->getAABB();
00168             if(aabb_a.maxAxisSeparation(b_node->bbox) > carve::EPSILON) continue;
00169 
00170             for(size_t j = 0; j < b_node->data.size(); ++j) {
00171                 MeshSet<3>::face_t *fb = b_node->data[j];
00172                 aabb<3> aabb_b = fb->getAABB();
00173                 if(aabb_b.maxAxisSeparation(aabb_a) > carve::EPSILON) continue;
00174 
00175                 std::pair<double, double> a_ra = fa->rangeInDirection(fa->plane.N, fa->edge->vert->v);
00176                 std::pair<double, double> b_ra = fb->rangeInDirection(fa->plane.N, fa->edge->vert->v);
00177                 if(carve::rangeSeparation(a_ra, b_ra) > carve::EPSILON) continue;
00178 
00179                 std::pair<double, double> a_rb = fa->rangeInDirection(fb->plane.N, fb->edge->vert->v);
00180                 std::pair<double, double> b_rb = fb->rangeInDirection(fb->plane.N, fb->edge->vert->v);
00181                 if(carve::rangeSeparation(a_rb, b_rb) > carve::EPSILON) continue;
00182 
00183                 if(!Carve_facesAreCoplanar(fa, fb)) {
00184                     if(Carve_checkEdgeFaceIntersections(intersections, fa, fb)) {
00185                         return true;
00186                     }
00187                 }
00188             }
00189         }
00190     }
00191 
00192     return false;
00193 }
00194 
00195 static bool Carve_checkMeshSetInterseciton(RTreeNode<3, Face<3> *> *rtree_a, RTreeNode<3, Face<3> *> *rtree_b)
00196 {
00197     carve::csg::Intersections intersections;
00198 
00199     return Carve_checkMeshSetInterseciton_do(intersections, rtree_a, rtree_b);
00200 }

00202 static void Carve_getIntersectedOperandMeshes(std::vector<MeshSet<3>::mesh_t*> &meshes, MeshSet<3>::aabb_t &otherAABB,
00203                                               std::vector<MeshSet<3>::mesh_t*> &operandMeshes)
00204 {
00205     std::vector<MeshSet<3>::mesh_t*>::iterator it = meshes.begin();
00206     std::vector< RTreeNode<3, Face<3> *> *> meshRTree;
00207 
00208     while(it != meshes.end()) {
00209         MeshSet<3>::mesh_t *mesh = *it;
00210         bool isAdded = false;
00211 
00212         RTreeNode<3, Face<3> *> *rtree = RTreeNode<3, Face<3> *>::construct_STR(mesh->faces.begin(), mesh->faces.end(), 4, 4);
00213 
00214         if (rtree->bbox.intersects(otherAABB)) {
00215             bool isIntersect = false;
00216 
00217             std::vector<MeshSet<3>::mesh_t*>::iterator operand_it = operandMeshes.begin();
00218             std::vector<RTreeNode<3, Face<3> *> *>::iterator tree_it = meshRTree.begin();
00219             for(; operand_it!=operandMeshes.end(); operand_it++, tree_it++) {
00220                 RTreeNode<3, Face<3> *> *operandRTree = *tree_it;
00221 
00222                 if(Carve_checkMeshSetInterseciton(rtree, operandRTree)) {
00223                     isIntersect = true;
00224                     break;
00225                 }
00226             }
00227 
00228             if(!isIntersect) {
00229                 operandMeshes.push_back(mesh);
00230                 meshRTree.push_back(rtree);
00231 
00232                 it = meshes.erase(it);
00233                 isAdded = true;
00234             }
00235         }
00236 
00237         if (!isAdded) {
00238             delete rtree;
00239             it++;
00240         }
00241     }
00242 
00243     std::vector<RTreeNode<3, Face<3> *> *>::iterator tree_it = meshRTree.begin();
00244     for(; tree_it != meshRTree.end(); tree_it++) {
00245         delete *tree_it;
00246     }
00247 }
00248 
00249 static MeshSet<3> *Carve_getIntersectedOperand(std::vector<MeshSet<3>::mesh_t*> &meshes, MeshSet<3>::aabb_t &otherAABB)
00250 {
00251     std::vector<MeshSet<3>::mesh_t*> operandMeshes;
00252     Carve_getIntersectedOperandMeshes(meshes, otherAABB, operandMeshes);
00253 
00254     if (operandMeshes.size() == 0)
00255         return NULL;
00256 
00257     return Carve_meshSetFromMeshes(operandMeshes);
00258 }
00259 
00260 static MeshSet<3> *Carve_unionIntersectingMeshes(MeshSet<3> *poly,
00261                                                  MeshSet<3>::aabb_t &otherAABB,
00262                                                  carve::interpolate::FaceAttr<uint> &oface_num)
00263 {
00264     if(poly->meshes.size()<=1)
00265         return poly;
00266 
00267     carve::csg::CSG csg;
00268 
00269     oface_num.installHooks(csg);
00270     csg.hooks.registerHook(new carve::csg::CarveTriangulator, carve::csg::CSG::Hooks::PROCESS_OUTPUT_FACE_BIT);
00271 
00272     std::vector<MeshSet<3>::mesh_t*> orig_meshes =
00273             std::vector<MeshSet<3>::mesh_t*>(poly->meshes.begin(), poly->meshes.end());
00274 
00275     MeshSet<3> *left = Carve_getIntersectedOperand(orig_meshes, otherAABB);
00276 
00277     if (!left) {
00278         /* no maniforlds which intersects another object at all */
00279         return poly;
00280     }
00281 
00282     while(orig_meshes.size()) {
00283         MeshSet<3> *right = Carve_getIntersectedOperand(orig_meshes, otherAABB);
00284 
00285         if (!right) {
00286             /* no more intersecting manifolds which intersects other object */
00287             break;
00288         }
00289 
00290         try {
00291             if(left->meshes.size()==0) {
00292                 delete left;
00293 
00294                 left = right;
00295             }
00296             else {
00297                 MeshSet<3> *result = csg.compute(left, right, carve::csg::CSG::UNION, NULL, carve::csg::CSG::CLASSIFY_EDGE);
00298 
00299                 delete left;
00300                 delete right;
00301 
00302                 left = result;
00303             }
00304         }
00305         catch(carve::exception e) {
00306             std::cerr << "CSG failed, exception " << e.str() << std::endl;
00307 
00308             MeshSet<3> *result = Carve_meshSetFromTwoMeshes(left->meshes, right->meshes);
00309 
00310             delete left;
00311             delete right;
00312 
00313             left = result;
00314         }
00315         catch(...) {
00316             delete left;
00317             delete right;
00318 
00319             throw "Unknown error in Carve library";
00320         }
00321     }
00322 
00323     /* append all meshes which doesn't have intersection with another operand as-is */
00324     if (orig_meshes.size()) {
00325         MeshSet<3> *result = Carve_meshSetFromTwoMeshes(left->meshes, orig_meshes);
00326 
00327         delete left;
00328 
00329         return result;
00330     }
00331 
00332     return left;
00333 }
00334 
00335 static void Carve_unionIntersections(MeshSet<3> **left_r, MeshSet<3> **right_r,
00336                                      carve::interpolate::FaceAttr<uint> &oface_num)
00337 {
00338     MeshSet<3> *left, *right;
00339 
00340     MeshSet<3>::aabb_t leftAABB = (*left_r)->getAABB();
00341     MeshSet<3>::aabb_t rightAABB = (*right_r)->getAABB();
00342 
00343     left = Carve_unionIntersectingMeshes(*left_r, rightAABB, oface_num);
00344     right = Carve_unionIntersectingMeshes(*right_r, leftAABB, oface_num);
00345 
00346     if(left != *left_r)
00347         delete *left_r;
00348 
00349     if(right != *right_r)
00350         delete *right_r;
00351 
00352     *left_r = left;
00353     *right_r = right;
00354 }
00355 
00356 static MeshSet<3> *Carve_addMesh(CSG_FaceIteratorDescriptor &face_it,
00357                                  CSG_VertexIteratorDescriptor &vertex_it,
00358                                  carve::interpolate::FaceAttr<uint> &oface_num,
00359                                  uint &num_origfaces)
00360 {
00361     CSG_IVertex vertex;
00362     std::vector<carve::geom3d::Vector> vertices;
00363 
00364     while (!vertex_it.Done(vertex_it.it)) {
00365         vertex_it.Fill(vertex_it.it,&vertex);
00366         vertices.push_back(VECTOR(vertex.position[0],
00367                                   vertex.position[1],
00368                                   vertex.position[2]));
00369         vertex_it.Step(vertex_it.it);
00370     }
00371 
00372     CSG_IFace face;
00373     std::vector<int> f;
00374     int numfaces = 0;
00375 
00376     // now for the polygons.
00377     // we may need to decalare some memory for user defined face properties.
00378 
00379     std::vector<int> forig;
00380     while (!face_it.Done(face_it.it)) {
00381         face_it.Fill(face_it.it,&face);
00382 
00383         if (isFacePlanar(face, vertices)) {
00384             f.push_back(face.vertex_number);
00385             f.push_back(face.vertex_index[0]);
00386             f.push_back(face.vertex_index[1]);
00387             f.push_back(face.vertex_index[2]);
00388 
00389             if (face.vertex_number == 4)
00390                 f.push_back(face.vertex_index[3]);
00391 
00392             forig.push_back(face.orig_face);
00393             ++numfaces;
00394             face_it.Step(face_it.it);
00395             ++num_origfaces;
00396         }
00397         else {
00398             f.push_back(3);
00399             f.push_back(face.vertex_index[0]);
00400             f.push_back(face.vertex_index[1]);
00401             f.push_back(face.vertex_index[2]);
00402 
00403             forig.push_back(face.orig_face);
00404             ++numfaces;
00405 
00406             if (face.vertex_number == 4) {
00407                 f.push_back(3);
00408                 f.push_back(face.vertex_index[0]);
00409                 f.push_back(face.vertex_index[2]);
00410                 f.push_back(face.vertex_index[3]);
00411 
00412                 forig.push_back(face.orig_face);
00413                 ++numfaces;
00414             }
00415 
00416             face_it.Step(face_it.it);
00417             ++num_origfaces;
00418         }
00419     }
00420 
00421     MeshSet<3> *poly = new MeshSet<3> (vertices, numfaces, f);
00422 
00423     uint i;
00424     MeshSet<3>::face_iter face_iter = poly->faceBegin();
00425     for (i = 0; face_iter != poly->faceEnd(); ++face_iter, ++i) {
00426         MeshSet<3>::face_t *face = *face_iter;
00427         oface_num.setAttribute(face, forig[i]);
00428     }
00429 
00430     return poly;
00431 }
00432 
00433 static double triangleArea(carve::geom3d::Vector &v1, carve::geom3d::Vector &v2, carve::geom3d::Vector &v3)
00434 {
00435     carve::geom3d::Vector a = v2 - v1;
00436     carve::geom3d::Vector b = v3 - v1;
00437 
00438     return carve::geom::cross(a, b).length();
00439 }
00440 
00441 static bool checkValidQuad(std::vector<MeshSet<3>::vertex_t> &vertex_storage, uint quad[4])
00442 {
00443     carve::geom3d::Vector &v1 = vertex_storage[quad[0]].v;
00444     carve::geom3d::Vector &v2 = vertex_storage[quad[1]].v;
00445     carve::geom3d::Vector &v3 = vertex_storage[quad[2]].v;
00446     carve::geom3d::Vector &v4 = vertex_storage[quad[3]].v;
00447 
00448 #if 0
00449     /* disabled for now to prevent initially non-planar be triangulated
00450      * in theory this might cause some artifacts if intersections happens by non-planar
00451      * non-concave quad, but in practice it's acceptable */
00452     if (!isQuadPlanar(v1, v2, v3, v4)) {
00453         /* non-planar faces better not be merged because of possible differences in triangulation
00454          * of non-planar faces in opengl and renderer */
00455         return false;
00456     }
00457 #endif
00458 
00459     carve::geom3d::Vector edges[4];
00460     carve::geom3d::Vector normal;
00461     bool normal_set = false;
00462 
00463     edges[0] = v2 - v1;
00464     edges[1] = v3 - v2;
00465     edges[2] = v4 - v3;
00466     edges[3] = v1 - v4;
00467 
00468     for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
00469         int n = i + 1;
00470 
00471         if (n == 4)
00472             n = 0;
00473 
00474         carve::geom3d::Vector current_normal = carve::geom::cross(edges[i], edges[n]);
00475 
00476         if (current_normal.length() > DBL_EPSILON) {
00477             if (!normal_set) {
00478                 normal = current_normal;
00479                 normal_set = true;
00480             }
00481             else if (carve::geom::dot(normal, current_normal) < 0) {
00482                 return false;
00483             }
00484         }
00485     }
00486 
00487     if (!normal_set) {
00488         /* normal wasn't set means face is degraded and better merge it in such way */
00489         return false;
00490     }
00491 
00492     double area = triangleArea(v1, v2, v3) + triangleArea(v1, v3, v4);
00493     if (area <= DBL_EPSILON)
00494         return false;
00495 
00496     return true;
00497 }
00498 
00499 // check whether two faces share an edge, and if so merge them
00500 static uint quadMerge(std::map<MeshSet<3>::vertex_t*, uint> *vertexToIndex_map,
00501                       std::vector<MeshSet<3>::vertex_t> &vertex_storage,
00502                       MeshSet<3>::face_t *f1, MeshSet<3>::face_t *f2,
00503                       uint v, uint quad[4])
00504 {
00505     uint current, n1, p1, n2, p2;
00506     uint v1[3];
00507     uint v2[3];
00508 
00509     // get the vertex indices for each face
00510     v1[0] = vertexToIndex_map->find(f1->edge->vert)->second;
00511     v1[1] = vertexToIndex_map->find(f1->edge->next->vert)->second;
00512     v1[2] = vertexToIndex_map->find(f1->edge->next->next->vert)->second;
00513 
00514     v2[0] = vertexToIndex_map->find(f2->edge->vert)->second;
00515     v2[1] = vertexToIndex_map->find(f2->edge->next->vert)->second;
00516     v2[2] = vertexToIndex_map->find(f2->edge->next->next->vert)->second;
00517 
00518     // locate the current vertex we're examining, and find the next and
00519     // previous vertices based on the face windings
00520     if (v1[0] == v) {current = 0; p1 = 2; n1 = 1;}
00521     else if (v1[1] == v) {current = 1; p1 = 0; n1 = 2;}
00522     else {current = 2; p1 = 1; n1 = 0;}
00523 
00524     if (v2[0] == v) {p2 = 2; n2 = 1;}
00525     else if (v2[1] == v) {p2 = 0; n2 = 2;}
00526     else {p2 = 1; n2 = 0;}
00527 
00528     // if we find a match, place indices into quad in proper order and return
00529     // success code
00530     if (v1[p1] == v2[n2]) {
00531         quad[0] = v1[current];
00532         quad[1] = v1[n1];
00533         quad[2] = v1[p1];
00534         quad[3] = v2[p2];
00535 
00536         return checkValidQuad(vertex_storage, quad);
00537     }
00538     else if (v1[n1] == v2[p2]) {
00539         quad[0] = v1[current];
00540         quad[1] = v2[n2];
00541         quad[2] = v1[n1];
00542         quad[3] = v1[p1];
00543 
00544         return checkValidQuad(vertex_storage, quad);
00545     }
00546 
00547     return 0;
00548 }
00549 
00550 static bool Carve_checkDegeneratedFace(MeshSet<3>::face_t *face)
00551 {
00552     /* only tris and quads for now */
00553     if (face->n_edges == 3) {
00554         return triangleArea(face->edge->prev->vert->v, face->edge->vert->v, face->edge->next->vert->v) < DBL_EPSILON;
00555     }
00556     else if (face->n_edges == 4) {
00557         return triangleArea(face->edge->vert->v, face->edge->next->vert->v, face->edge->next->next->vert->v) +
00558                triangleArea(face->edge->prev->vert->v, face->edge->vert->v, face->edge->next->next->vert->v) < DBL_EPSILON;
00559     }
00560 
00561     return false;
00562 }
00563 
00564 static BSP_CSGMesh *Carve_exportMesh(MeshSet<3>* &poly, carve::interpolate::FaceAttr<uint> &oface_num,
00565                                      uint num_origfaces)
00566 {
00567     uint i;
00568     BSP_CSGMesh *outputMesh = BSP_CSGMesh::New();
00569 
00570     if (outputMesh == NULL)
00571         return NULL;
00572 
00573     std::vector<BSP_MVertex> *vertices = new std::vector<BSP_MVertex>;
00574 
00575     outputMesh->SetVertices(vertices);
00576 
00577     std::map<MeshSet<3>::vertex_t*, uint> vertexToIndex_map;
00578     std::vector<MeshSet<3>::vertex_t>::iterator it = poly->vertex_storage.begin();
00579     for (i = 0; it != poly->vertex_storage.end(); ++i, ++it) {
00580         MeshSet<3>::vertex_t *vertex = &(*it);
00581         vertexToIndex_map[vertex] = i;
00582     }
00583 
00584     for (i = 0; i < poly->vertex_storage.size(); ++i ) {
00585         BSP_MVertex outVtx(MT_Point3 (poly->vertex_storage[i].v[0],
00586                                       poly->vertex_storage[i].v[1],
00587                                       poly->vertex_storage[i].v[2]));
00588         outVtx.m_edges.clear();
00589         outputMesh->VertexSet().push_back(outVtx);
00590     }
00591 
00592     // build vectors of faces for each original face and each vertex 
00593     std::vector<std::vector<uint> > vi(poly->vertex_storage.size());
00594     std::vector<std::vector<uint> > ofaces(num_origfaces);
00595     MeshSet<3>::face_iter face_iter = poly->faceBegin();
00596     for (i = 0; face_iter != poly->faceEnd(); ++face_iter, ++i) {
00597         MeshSet<3>::face_t *f = *face_iter;
00598         ofaces[oface_num.getAttribute(f)].push_back(i);
00599         MeshSet<3>::face_t::edge_iter_t edge_iter = f->begin();
00600         for (; edge_iter != f->end(); ++edge_iter) {
00601             int index = vertexToIndex_map[edge_iter->vert];
00602             vi[index].push_back(i);
00603         }
00604     }
00605 
00606     uint quadverts[4] = {0, 0, 0, 0};
00607     // go over each set of faces which belong to an original face
00608     std::vector< std::vector<uint> >::const_iterator fii;
00609     uint orig = 0;
00610     for (fii=ofaces.begin(); fii!=ofaces.end(); ++fii, ++orig) {
00611         std::vector<uint> fl = *fii;
00612         // go over a single set from an original face
00613         while (fl.size() > 0) {
00614             // remove one new face
00615             uint findex = fl.back();
00616             fl.pop_back();
00617 
00618             MeshSet<3>::face_t *f = *(poly->faceBegin() + findex);
00619 
00620             // for each vertex of this face, check other faces containing
00621             // that vertex to see if there is a neighbor also belonging to
00622             // the original face
00623             uint result = 0;
00624 
00625             MeshSet<3>::face_t::edge_iter_t edge_iter = f->begin();
00626             for (; edge_iter != f->end(); ++edge_iter) {
00627                 int v = vertexToIndex_map[edge_iter->vert];
00628                 for (uint pos2=0; !result && pos2 < vi[v].size();pos2++) {
00629 
00630                     // if we find the current face, ignore it
00631                     uint otherf = vi[v][pos2];
00632                     if (findex == otherf)
00633                         continue;
00634 
00635                     MeshSet<3>::face_t *f2 = *(poly->faceBegin() + otherf);
00636 
00637                     // if other face doesn't have the same original face,
00638                     // ignore it also
00639                     uint other_orig = oface_num.getAttribute(f2);
00640                     if (orig != other_orig)
00641                         continue;
00642 
00643                     // if, for some reason, we don't find the other face in
00644                     // the current set of faces, ignore it
00645                     uint other_index = 0;
00646                     while (other_index < fl.size() && fl[other_index] != otherf) ++other_index;
00647                     if (other_index == fl.size()) continue;
00648 
00649                     // see if the faces share an edge
00650                     result = quadMerge(&vertexToIndex_map, poly->vertex_storage, f, f2, v, quadverts);
00651                     // if faces can be merged, then remove the other face
00652                     // from the current set
00653                     if (result) {
00654                         uint replace = fl.back();
00655                         fl.pop_back();
00656                         if(otherf != replace)
00657                             fl[other_index] = replace;
00658                     }
00659                 }
00660             }
00661 
00662             bool degenerativeFace = false;
00663 
00664             if (!result) {
00665                 /* merged triangles are already checked for degenerative quad */
00666                 degenerativeFace = Carve_checkDegeneratedFace(f);
00667             }
00668 
00669             if (!degenerativeFace) {
00670                 // add all information except vertices to the output mesh
00671                 outputMesh->FaceSet().push_back(BSP_MFace());
00672                 BSP_MFace& outFace = outputMesh->FaceSet().back();
00673                 outFace.m_verts.clear();
00674                 outFace.m_plane.setValue(f->plane.N.v);
00675                 outFace.m_orig_face = orig;
00676 
00677                 // if we merged faces, use the list of common vertices; otherwise
00678                 // use the faces's vertices
00679                 if (result) {
00680                     // make quat using verts stored in result
00681                     outFace.m_verts.push_back(quadverts[0]);
00682                     outFace.m_verts.push_back(quadverts[1]);
00683                     outFace.m_verts.push_back(quadverts[2]);
00684                     outFace.m_verts.push_back(quadverts[3]);
00685                 } else {
00686                     MeshSet<3>::face_t::edge_iter_t edge_iter = f->begin();
00687                     for (; edge_iter != f->end(); ++edge_iter) {
00688                         //int index = ofacevert_num.getAttribute(f, edge_iter.idx());
00689                         int index = vertexToIndex_map[edge_iter->vert];
00690                         outFace.m_verts.push_back( index );
00691                     }
00692                 }
00693             }
00694         }
00695     }
00696 
00697     // Build the mesh edges using topological informtion
00698     outputMesh->BuildEdges();
00699     
00700     return outputMesh;
00701 }
00702 
00714 BoolOpState BOP_performBooleanOperation(BoolOpType                    opType,
00715                                         BSP_CSGMesh**                 outputMesh,
00716                                         CSG_FaceIteratorDescriptor    obAFaces,
00717                                         CSG_VertexIteratorDescriptor  obAVertices,
00718                                         CSG_FaceIteratorDescriptor    obBFaces,
00719                                         CSG_VertexIteratorDescriptor  obBVertices)
00720 {
00721     carve::csg::CSG::OP op;
00722     MeshSet<3> *left, *right, *output = NULL;
00723     carve::csg::CSG csg;
00724     carve::geom3d::Vector min, max;
00725     carve::interpolate::FaceAttr<uint> oface_num;
00726     uint num_origfaces = 0;
00727 
00728     switch (opType) {
00729         case BOP_UNION:
00730             op = carve::csg::CSG::UNION;
00731             break;
00732         case BOP_INTERSECTION:
00733             op = carve::csg::CSG::INTERSECTION;
00734             break;
00735         case BOP_DIFFERENCE:
00736             op = carve::csg::CSG::A_MINUS_B;
00737             break;
00738         default:
00739             return BOP_ERROR;
00740     }
00741 
00742     left = Carve_addMesh(obAFaces, obAVertices, oface_num, num_origfaces );
00743     right = Carve_addMesh(obBFaces, obBVertices, oface_num, num_origfaces );
00744 
00745     min.x = max.x = left->vertex_storage[0].v.x;
00746     min.y = max.y = left->vertex_storage[0].v.y;
00747     min.z = max.z = left->vertex_storage[0].v.z;
00748     for (uint i = 1; i < left->vertex_storage.size(); ++i) {
00749         min.x = MIN(min.x,left->vertex_storage[i].v.x);
00750         min.y = MIN(min.y,left->vertex_storage[i].v.y);
00751         min.z = MIN(min.z,left->vertex_storage[i].v.z);
00752         max.x = MAX(max.x,left->vertex_storage[i].v.x);
00753         max.y = MAX(max.y,left->vertex_storage[i].v.y);
00754         max.z = MAX(max.z,left->vertex_storage[i].v.z);
00755     }
00756     for (uint i = 0; i < right->vertex_storage.size(); ++i) {
00757         min.x = MIN(min.x,right->vertex_storage[i].v.x);
00758         min.y = MIN(min.y,right->vertex_storage[i].v.y);
00759         min.z = MIN(min.z,right->vertex_storage[i].v.z);
00760         max.x = MAX(max.x,right->vertex_storage[i].v.x);
00761         max.y = MAX(max.y,right->vertex_storage[i].v.y);
00762         max.z = MAX(max.z,right->vertex_storage[i].v.z);
00763     }
00764 
00765     carve::rescale::rescale scaler(min.x, min.y, min.z, max.x, max.y, max.z);
00766     carve::rescale::fwd fwd_r(scaler);
00767     carve::rescale::rev rev_r(scaler); 
00768 
00769     left->transform(fwd_r);
00770     right->transform(fwd_r);
00771 
00772     // prepare operands for actual boolean operation. it's needed because operands might consist of
00773     // several intersecting meshes and in case if another operands intersect an edge loop of intersecting that
00774     // meshes tessellation of operation result can't be done properly. the only way to make such situations
00775     // working is to union intersecting meshes of the same operand
00776     Carve_unionIntersections(&left, &right, oface_num);
00777 
00778     if(left->meshes.size() == 0 || right->meshes.size()==0) {
00779         // normally sohuldn't happen (zero-faces objects are handled by modifier itself), but
00780         // unioning intersecting meshes which doesn't have consistent normals might lead to
00781         // empty result which wouldn't work here
00782 
00783         delete left;
00784         delete right;
00785 
00786         return BOP_ERROR;
00787     }
00788 
00789     csg.hooks.registerHook(new carve::csg::CarveTriangulator, carve::csg::CSG::Hooks::PROCESS_OUTPUT_FACE_BIT);
00790 
00791     oface_num.installHooks(csg);
00792 
00793     try {
00794         output = csg.compute(left, right, op, NULL, carve::csg::CSG::CLASSIFY_EDGE);
00795     }
00796     catch(carve::exception e) {
00797         std::cerr << "CSG failed, exception " << e.str() << std::endl;
00798     }
00799     catch(...) {
00800         delete left;
00801         delete right;
00802 
00803         throw "Unknown error in Carve library";
00804     }
00805 
00806     delete left;
00807     delete right;
00808 
00809     if(!output)
00810         return BOP_ERROR;
00811 
00812     output->transform(rev_r);
00813 
00814     *outputMesh = Carve_exportMesh(output, oface_num, num_origfaces);
00815     delete output;
00816 
00817     return BOP_OK;
00818 }
Generated on Tue Nov 13 2012 11:54:05 for Blender by  doxygen 1.7.4
